Pre-Game Insights: Spain's coach expressed confidence in his team, stating 'We have the best team at this tournament.'
Germany's coach acknowledged Spain's threat but expressed confidence in his team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at MHPArena in Stuttgart and is expected to kick off at 1200 hrs ET/ 9hrs PST on July 5th, 2024.
Fans can watch the game live on Fox Sports and stream it on Fubo TV, and VIX.
Others: Spain's team did not have any issues with injuries except for Gavi and Isco, who suffered ACL and leg fractures, respectively.
